column6: "CRY WOLF" PART 1 (OF 4) It is the moment you've all been waiting for!!  Gambit returns to ULTIMATE X-MEN!!!  Because the fans demanded it, the Cajun thief is back!  But what is he going to steal?  And can the X-Men stop him?
column8: | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
